Code documentationÂ¶

In general the code is split into three main operations:

Sections

  • Running the command line
  • Calculations
  • Visualisation
    • Ps_figure class
    • Ps_axis class
    • NM_image class
      • Radial 2D plot class
      • Dispersion plot class
      • 3D Animation class
    • 2D Figures
      • Dispersion plot (static)
      • 2D radial plots (animated)
    • 3D Figures (animated)

Modules and classes involved in each of these can be found on seperate pages.
